neighborhoods.name: Korzo
neighborhoods.character: The vibrant heart of Rijeka featuring the main pedestrian promenade, historic architecture, and the city's social and commercial center.

location.description: The main pedestrian street and social center of Rijeka, running parallel to the waterfront with historic Austro-Hungarian buildings.

history.overview: Developed during the Austro-Hungarian period as the city's main social and commercial thoroughfare, reflecting Rijeka's multicultural heritage.
history.significance: Represents the golden age of Rijeka's development as a major port city and cultural melting pot.

practical_info.safety: Very safe with constant local and tourist presence
practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Morning for coffee culture, afternoon for shopping, evening for social life
practical_info.walkability: Highly walkable pedestrian zone with excellent connections

attractions.name: Korzo Promenade
attractions.description: The main pedestrian promenade with elegant Austro-Hungarian architecture and vibrant social life.
attractions.appeal: Experience the traditional Croatian 'korzo' ritual and city's social heart.

attractions.name: Rijeka City Tower
attractions.description: Iconic clock tower marking the entrance to the old town with medieval origins.
attractions.appeal: Symbol of Rijeka's medieval past and perfect starting point for exploration.

attractions.name: St. Vitus Cathedral
attractions.description: Baroque cathedral with impressive architecture and religious significance.
attractions.appeal: Explore the spiritual heart of Rijeka and its architectural heritage.

dining.name: Restaurant Korzo
dining.atmosphere: Casual waterfront with authentic local experience.

dining.name: Café Korzo
dining.atmosphere: Historic café with beautiful terrace and people-watching.

activities.name: Korzo Walk
activities.description: Experience the traditional evening stroll and social life of Rijeka.

activities.name: Architecture Tour
activities.description: Explore the Austro-Hungarian and Italian architectural heritage.

stay_here_if: You want to be in the heart of Rijeka's social life
You enjoy historic architecture and Mediterranean atmosphere
You want easy access to all major attractions
avoid_if: You want to avoid crowds and tourist areas
insider_tips: Visit in the evening to experience the traditional 'korzo' ritual
Explore the side streets for authentic local experiences
Many restaurants offer better prices away from the main promenade

neighborhoods.name: Old Town
neighborhoods.character: A charming medieval quarter with narrow cobblestone streets, historic buildings, and authentic local atmosphere.

location.description: The historic heart of Rijeka with medieval origins, featuring narrow streets and traditional architecture.

history.overview: Founded in medieval times, developed as a trading center, and preserved through various historical periods including Venetian, Austro-Hungarian, and Italian rule.
history.significance: Represents Rijeka's medieval origins and multicultural development as a port city.

practical_info.safety: Very safe with local residents and visitors
practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Morning for peaceful exploration, afternoon for museums, evening for dining
practical_info.walkability: Highly walkable but with some steep streets and stairs

attractions.name: Maritime Museum
attractions.description: Housed in the former Governor's Palace, showcasing Rijeka's rich maritime heritage.
attractions.appeal: Explore the city's port history and cultural development.

attractions.name: St. Vitus Cathedral
attractions.description: Baroque cathedral with impressive architecture and religious artifacts.
attractions.appeal: Visit the spiritual center of Rijeka and its architectural heritage.

attractions.name: Old Town Streets
attractions.description: Narrow cobblestone streets with traditional architecture and local life.
attractions.appeal: Experience authentic Rijeka and its medieval origins.

dining.name: Konoba Feral
dining.known_for: Fresh mussels and authentic local dishes
dining.atmosphere: Cozy and traditional with local atmosphere.

activities.name: Historical Walking Tour
activities.description: Explore the medieval streets and historic buildings of Old Town.

activities.name: Museum Visit
activities.description: Visit the Maritime Museum and learn about Rijeka's port heritage.

stay_here_if: You want to be in the historic heart of Rijeka
You enjoy medieval architecture and authentic atmosphere
You want easy access to major attractions
avoid_if: You want quiet nights (can be lively with locals)
insider_tips: Visit early morning for peaceful exploration and best photos
Explore the side streets for authentic local experiences
Many restaurants offer better prices than tourist areas

neighborhoods.name: Trsat
neighborhoods.character: A historic hilltop neighborhood with a medieval castle, panoramic views, and peaceful residential atmosphere.

location.description: Hilltop neighborhood overlooking Rijeka, featuring Trsat Castle and residential areas with spectacular city views.
landmarks: Church of Our Lady of Trsat

history.overview: Originally a medieval fortress and religious site, developed as a residential area with the castle serving as a key defensive position.
history.significance: Represents Rijeka's medieval defensive heritage and offers the best views of the city and harbor.

practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Sunset for best views, morning for peaceful exploration
practical_info.walkability: Moderately walkable with steep inclines and stairs

attractions.name: Trsat Castle
attractions.description: Historic castle with panoramic views of Rijeka, the harbor, and Kvarner Bay.
attractions.appeal: Best panoramic views of the city and surrounding islands.

attractions.name: Church of Our Lady of Trsat
attractions.description: Historic church with religious significance and beautiful architecture.
attractions.appeal: Explore the spiritual heritage and architectural beauty.

attractions.name: Panoramic Viewpoints
attractions.description: Multiple viewpoints offering spectacular views of the city and harbor.
attractions.appeal: Perfect for photography and enjoying the cityscape.

dining.name: Restaurant Trsat
dining.known_for: Peka and local specialties with castle views
dining.atmosphere: Rustic and authentic with historic setting.

dining.name: Café Trsat
dining.known_for: Coffee and pastries with panoramic views
dining.atmosphere: Historic café with stunning city vistas.

activities.name: Castle Visit
activities.description: Explore the medieval castle and enjoy panoramic views.

activities.name: Sunset Photography
activities.description: Capture stunning sunset views of Rijeka from the hilltop.

stay_here_if: You want peaceful, historic atmosphere with great views
You enjoy medieval architecture and castle settings
You prefer residential areas away from city center
avoid_if: You want to be in the heart of city life
You have mobility issues (steep hills and stairs)
You prefer modern amenities and nightlife
insider_tips: Visit at sunset for the most spectacular views of the city
Take the 561 steps for the authentic medieval experience
Many restaurants offer better value than tourist areas

neighborhoods.name: Harbor
neighborhoods.character: A working port area with maritime activities, ferry connections, and authentic industrial atmosphere.

location.description: Port area along the Kvarner Bay, featuring working docks, ferry terminal, and maritime activities.

history.overview: Developed as Rijeka's main port area, serving as the primary maritime gateway and industrial center.
history.significance: Represents Rijeka's maritime heritage and role as Croatia's largest port.

practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Morning for maritime activities, afternoon for ferry connections

attractions.name: Molo Longo
attractions.description: Historic pier extending into the Kvarner Bay with harbor views.
attractions.appeal: Perfect for watching ships and enjoying maritime atmosphere.

attractions.name: Ferry Terminal
attractions.description: Main ferry terminal for connections to Croatian islands and coastal destinations.
attractions.appeal: Gateway to island adventures and coastal exploration.

attractions.name: Port Area
attractions.description: Working port with commercial vessels and maritime activities.
attractions.appeal: Observe authentic maritime activities and port operations.

dining.name: Restaurant Marina
dining.atmosphere: Elegant waterfront dining with harbor views.

dining.name: Harbor Bar
dining.known_for: Coffee and simple meals with port views
dining.atmosphere: Casual café popular with local workers.

activities.name: Harbor Walk
activities.description: Walk along the harbor and observe maritime activities.

activities.name: Ferry to Islands
activities.description: Take ferries to nearby Croatian islands like Cres, Krk, or Rab.

stay_here_if: You need ferry connections to islands
avoid_if: You want to be close to major attractions
You prefer tourist amenities and services
You seek upscale dining and shopping

neighborhoods.name: Pećine
neighborhoods.character: A coastal residential area with beaches, family-friendly atmosphere, and excellent accommodation options.

location.description: Coastal area west of the city center, featuring residential areas, beaches, and tourist accommodations.

history.overview: Originally a quiet coastal area, developed as a residential district in the 20th century, now a popular area with excellent beaches.
history.significance: Represents Rijeka's expansion beyond the historic center and modern coastal development.
notable_events: Development as residential area in early 20th century

transit: Regular bus service to city center
practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Summer for beaches, year-round for accommodation
practical_info.walkability: Very walkable with good sidewalks and coastal promenades

attractions.name: Pećine Beach
attractions.description: Beautiful pebble beach with crystal-clear waters and excellent facilities.
attractions.appeal: Perfect for swimming, sunbathing, and water sports with family-friendly atmosphere.

attractions.name: Coastal Promenade
attractions.description: Scenic promenade along the coast with sea views and fresh air.
attractions.appeal: Great for leisurely walks and enjoying the Mediterranean atmosphere.

attractions.name: Residential Areas
attractions.description: Peaceful residential areas with local shops and authentic atmosphere.
attractions.appeal: Experience local life and find authentic local experiences.

activities.name: Beach Day
activities.description: Enjoy swimming, sunbathing, and water sports at Pećine beaches.

activities.name: Coastal Walk
activities.description: Scenic walk along the coastal promenade with sea views.

You enjoy beach activities and outdoor recreation
avoid_if: You want to be in the heart of historic Rijeka
You prefer vibrant nightlife and cultural activities
You want immediate access to major attractions
insider_tips: Visit the beaches early morning for the best spots and peaceful atmosphere
Use the coastal promenade for scenic walks and local experience
